# Protocol Launcher

> TypeScript library for generating Quick Launch (deep link) URLs to trigger app actions with one click, e.g., installing plugins, configuring servers, or setting API keys.

- ğŸ›¡ï¸ Type-Safe
- ğŸ§© Multi-App Ready
- ğŸ”¬ On-Demand / Tree-shakable
- ğŸ” Secure Encoding (safe configs, Unicode)
- âš™ï¸ Zero Runtime Dependencies
- ğŸ“¦ ESM First
- ğŸš€ One-click deep links to trigger app actions
